function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Laboratory simulations of aerosol dispersion in a fluid-filled channel may assist in modeling contagious disease spread in built environments.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in measurement techniques, vocalizations, and evaporation causing differing droplet distributions.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in interconnected devices and iot systems may lead to faster spread of contagious diseases","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Indoor environment quality ieq monitoring systems are necessary to detect energy-waste situations and contribute to developing solutions. since this is a worldwide problem, it is important to achieve versatile and low-cost ieq monitoring systems that are easy to implant in different buildings.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The work describes a full iot scalable architecture aimed at monitoring indoor environmental quality inside public buildings, such as university faculties, which runs over existing communication infrastructures.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of low-cost open-source hardware and wireless communication","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Remote-configurability of the system","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trade-off between sensor node cost and data quality in wireless gas sensor networks, leading to challenges in accurately monitoring indoor air quality.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of suitable chemical analysis technologies to determine the concentration of gaseous air pollutants specifically and sensitively at low-cost, posing challenges for long-term, stable detection.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective implementation of cloud and fog computing iot applications could lead to data integration challenges and operational inefficiencies.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of low-cost open-source hardware and software may result in lower quality and reliability of monitoring systems.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on bluetooth, zigbee, and wifi for communication in wireless sensor networks wsn may limit coverage and data transmission capabilities.","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of multiple communication protocols in iot applications can lead to interoperability issues and complexity in system integration.","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for strict qos requirements and performance limitations of communication protocols may lead to suboptimal iot system performance.","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sending data periodically to the cloud","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of wifi technology in public and private buildings for ieq monitoring.","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of mqtt protocol for communication in ieq monitoring systems.","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Issues with ieq sensor nodes triggering the reset procedure","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of low-cost opensource hardware may result in lower reliability and accuracy of ieq data.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on wifi connectivity for ieq measurements may lead to data transmission issues and interruptions in monitoring.","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of different sensor buses spi and i2c increases complexity and potential for technical failures.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Variation in sensor precision and accuracy for temperature, humidity, and air quality measurements.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of different sensor types and buses may introduce compatibility issues and data inconsistencies.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient use of battery capacity due to inaccurate dimensioning based on energy consumption data.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High power consumption from wifi communications","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerability to software changes due to foss technologies","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Alarms are generated when nodes are not working properly, indicating a risk of delayed identification and resolution of node malfunctions.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cloud connectivity may limit the ability to detect and respond to contagious disease outbreaks in real-time","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in co2 concentration depending on sensor location","category":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Variation in values based on the position of the smart ieq sensor nodes","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for pandemic containment","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Over-reliance on specific technological solutions","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unintended consequences of technology integration","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective detection of abnormal patterns in the built environment","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlap between alert and mitigation applications","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of sensors to detect symptoms may result in false positives or false negatives, leading to incorrect actions or delays in response.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on osm data for identifying risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper representation in osm databases","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on common sense knowledge may overlook critical risk factors related to disease transmission","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on default google maps risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of spatial information in modeling epidemic interventions","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile phone
